name: Intentional Loss & Pre Existing Loss
descr: Insurer won’t be able to compensate for an intentional/deliberate fraudulent act. Benefits of our partnership only begin once Prospect sign up for the policy. Not much Insurer can do before that.

name: Delayed Claims
descr: Unfortunately Insurer won’t be able to do much about claims reported after six months of occurrence.

name: Unexplained Loss
descr: There’s nothing more intriguing than solving a mystery. But losses that cannot be explained or traced, or mysterious disappearances, shall not be covered

name: Offline activity
descr: While Insurer promises to protect the prospect in the digital space, Insurer cant do much in the offline space under any plan.
